snippet: Indianapolis Colts linebacker Robert Mathis announced on Friday he will retire after Sunday's game against the Jacksonville Jaguars, ending 14 years with the organization....
lead_paragraph: Indianapolis Colts linebacker Robert Mathis announced on Friday he will retire after Sunday's game against the Jacksonville Jaguars, ending 14 years with the organization.

headline.main: Colts Linebacker Mathis to Retire After Season Finale
headline.print_headline: Colts Linebacker Mathis to Retire After Season Finale
